ValidationRule.description: This validation rule ensures that email and phone numbers are filled out.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: And( CONTAINS($Profile.Name,'Sales'), OR( ISBLANK(Shipping_Email__c), ISBLANK(Shipping_Phone__c) ), OR( ISBLANK(Shipping_Email__c), ISBLANK(Shipping_Mobile_Phone__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: In order to save the record Shipping Email and Shipping Phone need to be filled in.
